description:
Readiness-to-Learn is the internationally-recognised behaviour-for-learning course.

The course explains the five main principles of Readiness-to-Learn and includes over 50 resources (video, PPT and Word documents) to enable you to immediately use Readiness to Learn in your school.

The course will take approximately 4 hours to complete and is structured into five main sections which means you can go at your own pace.

Based on 20 years of research and used in schools around the world, this course is a must for anyone who is serious about understanding the cognitive, emotional and academic factors which create a 'success mindset' for students.
title: Readiness to Learn
